meaningMnemonic: The <radical>grain</radical>s you have stored in your <radical>house</radical> reflect on your <kanji>earnings</kanji>. If you earn a lot of money, you have more grains.
readingMnemonic: Another way to check someone's <kanji>earnings</kanji> is to see if they have a <reading>ca</reading>r (か). Would someone who doesn't make a lot of money have a car? No!
